mapper.select: SELECT B.ID AS boardId , B.USER_ID AS userId , U.USER_NAME AS userName , U.EMAIL AS email , B.TITLE AS title , B.CONTENT AS content , B.VIEWS AS views , DATE_FORMAT(B.CREATED_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS createdDate FROM board B INNER JOIN users U ON B.USER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE B.TYPE = #{type} AND B.ID = #{boardId}

SELECT B.USER_ID AS userId , U.USER_NAME AS userName , U.EMAIL AS email , B.CONTENT AS content , DATE_FORMAT(B.CREATED_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS createdDate FROM board_reply B INNER JOIN users U ON B.USER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE B.BOARD_ID = #{boardId} ORDER BY B.ID ASC
